backend/main.mo: Defines homepage content types, user profiles, and admin‑protected update APIs using AccessControl with CRUD endpoints for menu, highlights, testimonials, and contact info.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with Royal Cafe color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with SEO metadata for Royal Cafe.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing public vs editor views, loading homepage content, and checking admin authorization with React Query.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/admin/: Displays an access‑denied message with a button to return home for unauthorized users.
Admin login modal validating a fixed code, updating auth state, and triggering success callbacks.
Content editor UI for homepage text, highlights, testimonials, and menu data with save functionality.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/data/c: Static data definitions for highlights, menu categories, testimonials, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/Footer: Footer with quick links, Instagram link, and admin login flow that opens the editor after verifying admin status.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/NavBar: Responsive navbar with scroll-aware styling, navigation links, mobile menu, and admin login/editor access handling.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/sectio: About section displaying cafe description and a grid of feature cards with icons.
Contact and location section showing address, hours, and map link with loading states.
Empty placeholder file for a gallery section component.
Renders the landing hero with background image, logo, tagline, location, and CTA buttons with smooth-scroll behavior.
Displays parsed highlight items or loading skeletons in a grid with names, descriptions, prices, and optional badges.
Shows menu categories and items or skeleton loaders, including names, descriptions, and prices.
Parses and displays customer testimonials with star ratings or loading placeholders in a grid layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Wraps the admin-check query and exposes admin status with loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePageContent.ts: Fetches homepage content with fallback defaults and provides a mutation for saving updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via context using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and updating homepage content and checking admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, typography settings, and utility classes for Royal Cafe branding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using ReactDOM, wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and Royal Cafe theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current specification, features, issues, and design requirements for the Royal Cafe website.
